Attendees at Trump’s rally next week must agree not to sue campaign if they get coronavirus People attending President Trump’s rally in Tulsa, Okla., next Friday – the president’s first since the coronavirus pandemic shut down the country three months ago – must agree not to sue the Trump re-election campaign if they contract the virus.
Headlong into the mud As we get closer to the election, you will see more and more attack ads.

Republicans pick Jacksonville as alternative convention site The Republican National Committee has chosen Jacksonville, Fla., to host part of this summer’s party convention, after largely abandoning the city of Charlotte, N.C., over disagreements on coronavirus-related crowd restrictions.
